website_summaries.verdict: Hands down the best Vitamix blender there is. If you truly want top-of-the-line, there is no better option on the market right now.
pros: Great programs for smoothies, hot soups, frozen desserts, purees, and cleaning
Also comes with cookbook, guide, and instructional video
cons: More expensive than most other models, but excellent automatic programs are worth the cost

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be different than those at stores.
customer_reviews.text: Item appears to be a fake unit, the packaging is different that those at stores. Recipe book is not in English.
customer_reviews.author: Rodrigo Romero

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix Changed My Kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: What a powerful, wonderful and very effective kitchen tool this Vitamix blender is! I was using a Bullet but had to ditch it when the news about the class action lawsuit surfaced. I went looking for a replacement and you may be thinking the Vitamix is a bit over the top. I can assure you, it is not. I love using it, love learning new recipes with it and love just seeing it sit on my counter. The Vitamix can help you make just about anything and it even has its own cleaning cycle so you just add soapy water and sit back. I love this blender and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: P. A. Muccigrosso

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful high powered blender
customer_reviews.text: I have been using an older VitaMix blender that has 3 pre-programmed settings for over 10 years, and it has been excellent. It got LOTS of use. Bearings started to age, so sent it to VitaMix to service it (“gifting” it to my daughter). She is very happy with my older reconditioned one, and I bought this newer model for myself. Love it, love it, love it. If U R thinking of getting a decent blender, invest in one of these. It will last a long time, and is a workhorse!
customer_reviews.author: LeonaBelle

customer_reviews.title: Cracked Container
customer_reviews.text: Blender has a small crack in the bottom. Leaking the first time I used it. Base seems to work well but need a replacement container.
customer_reviews.author: grayson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It's a vitamix what more needs to be said. I've wanted a vitamix for years and I finally got this one last Christmas. I may not use it every day but I use it often and it's so nice to be able and put it onto auto and let it run through the course without me having to pulse it. Occasionally I have to use the tamper tool but it's the machine that makes it all so very nice and easy. Plus it's easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Movie lover

customer_reviews.title: Scary loud and really powerful
customer_reviews.text: I received a bucket of brownie points from the wife for surprising her with this tool for her semi-serious cooking and baking setup. It can actually heat items to create hot soup as you mix them. I'm impressed. Easy to clean, but be sure to invest in the scraper designed for this unit. That was my gift to me as I have dishwashing duties.
customer_reviews.author: Watts

customer_reviews.title: Waiting for refund
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered it for use in Singapore but this is110volts which will not work there. That is why I returned it. It is more than 25 days since it has been picked up but is still shown as returned only. When I am going get my money back. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Sundar

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix 750
customer_reviews.text: It's an incredible machine unlike any ordinary blender. Still experimenting with the many smoothie recipes. The reviews are right on. It's more than a blender. I love the pre-programmed settings where I just turn it on and wait to completion. The motor is not that much louder than ordinary blenders. But you can still hear the torque and strength that this machine can put out. Its a great blender.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Love it.. but with some cons
customer_reviews.text: I wish I got one sooner! It’s very powerful and blends everything smoothly. There are a couple things I’m not a fan of. When you start blending, even if you start low, the ingredients explode all over the blender which means you either have to stope and scrape things down or stop and swirl and start again. This is a bit frustrating when trying to quickly make a smoothie. The other thing I was a bit disappointed in was that it’s advertised as self cleaning but it’s really not. You still have to use a sponge even after rinsing and using soap and water for the self cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: AAO

customer_reviews.title: What's not to love?
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made machine that makes easy work of all my blending needs. No more soaking nuts for cashew cream or nut butters. Perfect smoothies, sauces, soups, banana ice cream, and my own weird vegan-ish creations! I am in love and I never take it off my counter. So glad I bit the bullet and bought this for myself. I joke with my husband that this beast will last a lifetime and I will have to put it in my will! To top it off, it is made right here in the USA (shout out Cleveland!). My only regret is that I didn't buy it sooner!
customer_reviews.author: MRSTOLL

customer_reviews.title: Great power, easy to use, loud as heck
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to make smoothies and it's great! The container that comes with it is pretty large so we ended up buying the personal cup adapter. The only reason it doesn't get 5 stars is because it is quite loud. I bought this with the understanding that it is 40% quieter than the other blenders they offer. I am considering building an acrylic cover for the blender to help reduce the noise.
customer_reviews.author: SGullen

customer_reviews.title: Great blender!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Powerful, easy to clean, easy to use, makes large batches Cons: Only able to make large batches, it’s a pain trying to blend a small amount of ingredients. Save yourself the hassle and get the smaller container as well. Loud
customer_reviews.author: Ira

customer_reviews.title: You already know it is the best blender and it is expensive!
customer_reviews.text: It is the best blender out there. It is expensive. Took me a while to convince myself to buy it. But I've learned that for certain things you pay once and u use it a lifetime. And this blender does things that no other cheap blender can accomplish. It liquifies anything you throw in there
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Best quality for best price
customer_reviews.text: As you know this is the number one best bLender in the whole world and I got this blender at Amazon for really really good price it worth of money thank you. I use this for juice baby food and all other stuff
customer_reviews.author: lizzy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: expensive. seems less powerful than the last model, but does not heat up as much also. Not as noisy, you you can leave it for an extra minute. The shorter, wider design works better. It fits in the fridge easier.
customer_reviews.author: White Dog

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Best blender I've ever used! And then some...
customer_reviews.text: Best, darned, blender, ever. Seriously, this was anbupgrade from a Cuisinart, which I loved, but this is in a different class. This thing actually makes hot soup!!! And fast - in like 5 minutes! I never thought I needed one, but now I wouldn't want a kitchen without one. It even comes with a hardcover cookbook filled with easy recipes for soups, dips, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Alison Sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, yet easy to use and clean.
customer_reviews.text: A must for making nut butters! A lesser blender would burn out. Also great at smoothies, juices, hot soups. Love the presets on this model.
customer_reviews.author: NC Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I was on the fence about purchasing a $500 blender, but this is the real deal. I had a Ninja blender previous and while it was okay for 9 years it eventually broke. The consistency of my smoothies are now smoothie shop quality. I was used to having bits and chunks of fruit in my smoothies (I use frozen fruit) and with the Vitamix it is so much better. Worth the money, good warranty, and comes with a cookbook and a few other items. First night I made soup and a smoothie. 10/10 from me. Do not regret the purchase whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K.

customer_reviews.title: You need strength to use this machine.
customer_reviews.text: I found it quite difficult to get the lid off & on. It is also quite heavy. I'm 78 and not very strong, so keep that in mind. I do like the cleaning cycle. I've only had it a short time, maybe after a while I can say more. Someone told me that celery strings get stuck in the blades. Is that true? Do I have to pull off the strings before blending?
customer_reviews.author: MarcyVP

customer_reviews.title: Love This Machine
customer_reviews.text: Cannot say enough positive things. We use it multiple times every day. Being vegan, mixing power is important and making smoothies is a daily event. The ease of cleanup is amazing. I don’t use my food processor anymore. Get the scraper when you order simply for ease. It’s well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: CLGB

customer_reviews.title: Too noisy
customer_reviews.text: I splurged on this blender ($642) to avoid the noise of cheap alternatives. It's noisy too. Sigh.
customer_reviews.author: South Texan

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Vitamix. I gifted my old one and purchased this version because it was more compact and fit neatly under my counters. It exceeded expectations and I love the advanced features.
customer_reviews.author: Pascale Haspil

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love its low profile, no other blender can compare that I've seen
customer_reviews.author: Sporing

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It came quick and it is exactly as advertised. The seller was great too in sending me a reply to a question right away.
customer_reviews.author: Davin

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful!
customer_reviews.text: My dad bought this for my mom for Christmas and boy was she ever surprised! Very powerful and she very much enjoys it.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made, solid as a rock and could probably blend one. Easy and intuitive controls and a wide range of options if you are a blending connoisseur. Ive been through a number of blenders before and this is definitely a step up, best Ive found so far.
customer_reviews.author: xenoc

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix works very efficiently with easy to use directions.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly. We've already made delicious smoothies and purchased ingredients for soup so we can try the soup function. Looking forward to making frozen desserts.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K Braun

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT!
customer_reviews.text: The online reviews are accurate. If you’re going to use it, it’s worth the money. It is big though and I mean big. It was also too tall for my cabinets but hey what did you expect.
customer_reviews.author: PiedPiper

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this for the price and for what it does.  Well worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this product for the price. I would recommend it to anyone and would say for the price, and for what it does, it is worth the investment and I expect it to last. I am able to yield quite a bit from the vegetables and fruits I have been blending and grinding. I'm eager to try out some of the recipes from the book that came with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bon H

customer_reviews.title: Super smooth
customer_reviews.text: My smoothies are much much better. Can’t wait to try soups and ice cream
customer_reviews.author: Diva180

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing blender. The most I'd ever spent on a blender but well worth it. Highly recommend this to anyone who is shopping for a great blender. Hands down the best blender on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Dealz 4 Realz

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome blending
customer_reviews.text: Comfort and power for my vita blends Great power and Ease The jar is pretty broad and easy to clean too
customer_reviews.author: Tandon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I had my other one for over 20 years, still going strong, but I wanted the new style.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Green

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Worth getting the professional-grade. Works as a blender, food processor, you name it.
customer_reviews.author: Lhr

customer_reviews.title: Its the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Does everything! Worth the $$$ You wont need another blender /mixer . I have owned pretty much all the other brands dont come close to this brand and model.
customer_reviews.author: loren wells

customer_reviews.title: Terrific & Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Powerhouse great blender. I make the most wonderful smoothies with this powerful machine. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Seara

customer_reviews.title: Product works great.
customer_reviews.text: Product manufacture date was January 2016 and it passed the Teflon partial test. Ran the warm water and white bowl test 5 times and not once did I find any black (or any other) foreign particles. Product works great.
customer_reviews.author: Annihilator

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix, my best choice for my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is the Best Choice Of items I have bought for my kitchen. I Simply Love this Amazing Blender 👍👏
customer_reviews.author: eduvina rosas

customer_reviews.title: Pulverizes whatever your heart desires
customer_reviews.text: Will crunch whip anything. Nuts, fruits you name it, this machine does it.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Sonnenblick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This blender allows me to make the most amazing smoothies! My husband and I use it everyday to make our beloved green smoothies and they are so smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Amazon wouldnt let me post my other review :(
customer_reviews.text: Ended up returning the blender, just wasn't for me though it was nice and all. Seller gets 12 stars for their handling of my return.
customer_reviews.author: Arch Michael

customer_reviews.title: Vita Mix machine
customer_reviews.text: I had one for over 30 years, but I wanted one for making hot and cold item. I believe if you are happy with what you had, replace it with the same brand!
customer_reviews.author: Frieda M. Christener

customer_reviews.title: The power of this blender is without equal and the easy cleanup is great
customer_reviews.text: This has changed our eating habits, our breakfasts are much healthier (and easier to make)! We haven't had the time to explore making soups or desserts, but we are looking forward to trying those options out. The power of this blender is without equal and the easy cleanup is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great smoothies
customer_reviews.text: I been wanting this blender for awhile I’m glad I got one it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Smoothie!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, make my smoothies everyday! Also makes great salad dressing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: Is a wonderful product . Love to make smoothies and ice cream is perfect
customer_reviews.author: maria hernandez

customer_reviews.title: BEST BLENDER EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG... Only had a month and making more things that I could ever imagine in a blender. LOVE IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money for sure
customer_reviews.text: The best blender ever!!! Easy to use easy to clean and my smoothies come out perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Molina

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Fight The Power
customer_reviews.text: This is a “beast” of a blender. It powers through the ingredients effortlessly and efficiently.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Mostly use this product for smoothies. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Benny  Frost

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases of my life! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Laminas® Customer Support

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: This is best blender, I have ever used, powerful and easy to clean

customer_reviews.title: The Animal!
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine! It does everything they said it would. Clean up is a breeze.

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Powerful engine, Easy cleaning Easy to make smoothies, chop vegetables.
customer_reviews.author: Jin

customer_reviews.title: the best durable buy ever
customer_reviews.text: the best durable buy ever; I had lot of blender that did not last me long enough. this is worth the money for those who like to supplement normal diet; especially if you are business person that travel a lot, sometimes you dont have time for serial in the morning; whilst you jump quick into the shower; by the time you get out, you smoothy is smoot and ready to go down your pipes. excellent
customer_reviews.author: Mack Mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Can make excellent smoothies for the whole ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Can make excellent smoothies for the whole family with very little effort. Kids enjoy a smoothie every morning. Have only had it 1 month, so not sure if it's reliable, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Krishnan

customer_reviews.title: Good item!!
customer_reviews.text: good!! It is best way to get fresh juice. And delivery was very fast. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this machine!! It's everything that it says it is.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Sittig

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect. I like it and luse it every day
customer_reviews.text: It is perfect. I like it and luse it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Makes amazing smoothies and soup! Easy to clean. Fits on my counter!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Arnold-Bluestone

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I don't like a lot of texture in my blends. The smoothie was actually smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 1-2 use, it does not do the job properly.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this blender to make smoothie from fruits. I was so impressed with the power for the first 1-2 uses. After that, it does not chop the fruits properly anymore. Changing the size of the fruits or the amount I put does not make any difference. The blade just keeps moving at the bottom (so only the bottom part is blended) while the fruits above stay there. I have to stir and stir and change the location of the fruits for several times until the job gets finally done. I did not use for anything else - how can fruits make the blade so dull so quickly? Cleaning is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Snow girl

customer_reviews.title: Blender leaked everywhere
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about receiving this blender. I was very disappointed when it leaked all over my counter. You would think VitaMix would have better quality control when they charge $600 for a blender.
customer_reviews.author: KAHMKB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this blending miracle!
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to purchase this item because of its price but I am so glad I splurged. I absolutely LOVE it. I use it to make my morning breakfast fruit shake (blends everything so smoothly!). Also to prepare color additions to make colorful pasta dough (blends beets, blueberries, frozen peas) to allow for a perfectly colored pasta dough. Made mango sorbet and also tomato pasta sauce. I can’t imagine what this machine could not do. And it cleans itself! Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Boyd

customer_reviews.title: This is the high bar...and nothing is even close.
customer_reviews.text: I use a blender for all the mundane things everyone else does, but on occasion I need it to make large quantities of salsa. I have been using a Cuisinart, which was fine, but took forever to chop and combine ingredient, plus was messy. Had to swallow hard when I hit the purchase button, but this blender is lightyears beyond anything I've ever used. Took half the time to do twice as much and no mess. We just put our Juicer, and soon the Cuisinart, in the Goodwill box opening space for this "MUST HAVE" kitchen miracle.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Malwaukie

customer_reviews.title: No regrets!
customer_reviews.text: Where have you been all my life?! I have always been a big fan of breakfast / energy smoothies. My favorite texture was Jamba Juice, the ice was so refined. Now I can officially get professional grade smoothies each morning and have the benefit of making them even more healthy for myself. Made my first milkshakes for the family yesterday, unsweetened coconut milk, frozen strawberries, banana and peaches, with vanilla ice cream. The texture was so smooth, it felt and tasted like homemade ice cream. Only a few days in with the Vitamix 750, but already in love. Cant wait to try out the other features!
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Powerful machine, nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Powerful machine and can be used to make some very tasty fruit smoothies. It feels nice and sturdy. I can see why for such price the bowl is not made of glass but polymer, it probably for the safety / drop protection reason. However, it is fairly easy to clean. Wife and kids love this machine and they keep testing various recipes; They are very happy about the results and that is what matters.
customer_reviews.author: redriver

customer_reviews.title: My husband LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: After some trouble with Amazon's customer service (we had a wedding registry kerfuffle) my sweet hubby was able to purchase his new toy. He absolutely LOVES it and uses it 3-4 times a week. As of now there are no issues with the Vitamix and he is a happy camper. We will continue to review as the time goes on. Our hopes are up for this product though and we are hoping it lasts longer than the average US marriage! :D
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Pearce-DeJesus

customer_reviews.title: Loud but stable. Comes with a stirring rod (don't need to order it separately)
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty loud and sounds like it'll shake itself apart or spill the contents when running in cleaning mode (or any automatic mode). But it's built well and sits on the counter with no problems during the vigorous blending cycles. Many videos on YouTube will attest that hands-free operation is ok. No need to hold it. Turns pineapple cores to frothy smoothies no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Sarutabaruta

customer_reviews.title: Wife love it
customer_reviews.text: old blender died, I asked what she would like. She said if had my choice it would be this one, but I'm inclined to buy the less expensive blenders. So I got her this one & she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Matyasic

customer_reviews.title: Another awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I had a Nuti-Bullet Rx and did not think any blender could make me happier. I was wrong this is great and Love the 750 Series. I would never give up this blender. I have made smoothies, peanut butter (no sugar added) and the grandbabies love this peanut butter more than the store bought. I have done so much with this blender and would not hesitate to recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: BErwin PhD MH

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Blender
customer_reviews.text: In about 30 seconds you get smooth texture like ice cream that I could never achieve with a regular blender
customer_reviews.author: Ona J

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: What more can I say. This is the best blender ever. Like all the positive reviews I just can’t say enough. If I outlive this, I would purchase another one.
customer_reviews.author: FishRFriends

customer_reviews.title: worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding device- excellent at pulverizing everything, including ice cubes, down to the blueberry skins (no blue flecks left); easy to clean, easy to set up - just pop the container onto the base-- no setting up with blades and washers, no need to tighten the container over the base. Having the blade and container integrated, with no need to assemble and disassemble, is terrific, as is self-cleaning function.
customer_reviews.author: gattineri

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for shakes and smoothies!
customer_reviews.text: My old blender would not completely blend everything together. I do not have this problem with the Vitamix. We have been using it for 60 days and love it. Works great with frozen fruit and hard to blend vegetables. Very easy to clean with soap and water. Easy to put together and store. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Emilie H.

customer_reviews.title: My best Vitamix yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Vitamix and the best one yet! We make 2 carafes each day literally packed to the top full of greens and veggies to make green smoothies and this machine barely breathes hard. I really like the wider carafe and larger choices of settings. Highly recommend if you need a machine to work hard for you.
customer_reviews.author: L. Placek

customer_reviews.title: Don't know why I took so long to buy one ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know why I took so long to buy one. Saw the YouTube video where a guy compares the Vitamix with the Ninja Blender (which I had) and was immediately impressed that I could make peanut butter with the Vitamix. And I have made almond butter and sunflower seed butter. Delicious.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rett

customer_reviews.title: If a poor college student can buy one
customer_reviews.text: Total game changer. Vitamix fan all they way, nothing compares. We always had one in the house growing up, and I finally saved up money and bought one. If a poor college student can buy one, you can too. I make nut milks, nut butters, soups, smoothies, and so much more! It even came with a hard-cover recipe book with lots of fun ideas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great blender the only problem we face is if there ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blender the only problem we face is if there is very less quantity of something you want to blend then you have to add lot of water otherwise the blade just keep rotating without doing anything. I wish the blades are at little bit lower position
customer_reviews.author: sumit kumar singh

customer_reviews.title: Best blender I've ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: Best blender I've ever purchased. Waited until my Kitchen Aid died and couldn't be happier with it's replacement. A must-have for anyone who spends time in the kitchen. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing blender. I love the present settings and the wider container really helps with thick mixtures. Highly recommend this blender for those wanting the best.

customer_reviews.title: ... the book that provides a variety of uses is excellent. She has even made some very good soups ...
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it ~ the book that provides a variety of uses is excellent. She has even made some very good soups with it.

customer_reviews.title: I love my Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: I love my Vitamix . This is one bad dude here . Gets the job done . I use it every single day and sometimes two or three times a day . Very pleased and wish I had bought one years ago instead of all the other kitchen pieces I have bought over the years
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Vitamix
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase yet. So easy to use and to clean. Wonderful cookbook that came with it. I totally recommend this.

customer_reviews.title: Love it except one little thing...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it and it's actually my 2nd. The first one lasted 25 years! I gave it only 4 stars because it's not recommended dishwasher safe. Otherwise, I'd definitely give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Poodlemom

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This robot is amazing, it really works. I wish they would make them more stylish and estetic for the kitchen. They are not pretty at all.
customer_reviews.author: Cecifm

product_meta.title: Vitamix Professional Series 750 Blender, Professional-Grade, 64 oz. Low-Profile Container, Black, Self-Cleaning - 1957
product_meta.description:
Color:Black| Style:Blender

Vitamix fuels passions. It’s why we’re the brand most trusted by professional chefs. But you won’t just find us in restaurant kitchens. You’ll also find us in home kitchens around the world. Because whether you’re interested in the culinary arts, making healthier choices, or enjoying restaurant-quality smoothies at home—when you’re ready to move on and move up, when you’re ready to invest in your passion, you’re ready for Vitamix.

Built to Last
A bargain blender's not a bargain if it doesn't last. We know purchasing a Vitamix blender is an investment. But Vitamix blenders are built to last, helping you buy dependable, not disposable.

Easy to Clean
Just blend warm water and a drop of dish soap at your machine's highest speed, and watch it self-clean in 60 seconds or less - no disassembly required.

The Difference Is in the Blend
Since the number-one reason people purchase a blender is to make smoothies, it’s important to get them right. Whether you prefer an icy blend or a perfectly smooth purée, nutrition-packed with veggies or a light, fruity treat, Vitamix smoothies give you a delicious, even blend in every sip. 

Power
We don’t aim to have the highest horsepower. You don’t need more horses; you need trained ones. The focused power of our complete blending system causes every component of the Vitamix machine to work together, creating faster, smoother blends packed with flavor. 

The Universal Tool
Make smoothies & juices, hot soups, flours & dough, nut butter, frozen desserts, batters, dressings & sauces, non-dairy milks, and more. 

Manufactured in Cleveland, Ohio USA
feature_bullets: Automated Blending: Five pre-programmed settings ensure simple cleaning, walk-away convenience, and consistent results for smoothie, frozen dessert, soup, and purée recipes.
You're in Control: Variable Speed Control and Pulse feature let you manually fine-tune the texture of any recipe;Cord: 6 ft
Low-Profile 64-ounce Container: Perfect for family meals and entertaining, while fitting comfortably under most kitchen cabinets. Electrical Ratings - 120 V, 50-60 Hz, 12 Amps
Hardened Stainless-Steel Blades: Our aircraft-grade stainless steel blades are designed to handle the toughest ingredients, so from the first blend to the last, you get the same quality results.

Self-Cleaning: With a drop of dish soap and warm water, your Vitamix machine can clean itself in 30 to 60 seconds. What's in the Box: motor base, low-profile 64 oz. container, cookbook, getting started guide, DVD, low-profile tamper.HP: 2.2-peak
